name: Bloxx Block Puzzle
description:
Drag the blocks to fill the void! Puzzle your way through 300 levels.

How to Play
- Drag blocks to fill void.
- Use all blocks to win the level.
- Puzzle your way through 300+ levels
- Be happy :-)

Features
- Elegant & Minimalistic designed little Puzzle Game.
- Play anywhere! Low battery consumption!
- No Violence! The game is for everyone!
- 300+ unique levels! Designed for everyone!
- No WiFi required! Play everywhere Offline :)
- Use "Hints" to solve difficult puzzles.
- Game is super optimized and we keep your Data Protected and Safe.
